name: Dracula Series: Part 3 - The Destruction of the Evil
name_original: Dracula Series: Part 3 - The Destruction of the Evil
description:
Dracula Series: Part 3 - The Destruction of the Evil is an adventure game developed by Tetraedge. It came out on 20-10-2010. Anuman Interactive published the game.
Dracula Series: Part 3 - The Destruction of the Evil is available on PC.
